title: LPQ BULLSHIT (READ THIS)
body:
Ok heres what happened. I'm in LPQ (Low Priority Queue) and then when I start going into queue, my screen goes BLACK in champion select, and i can't do anything. By the time champion select is done, it says 'You have left the queue because you have failed to pick a champion in champ select'. Like WTF is this bullshit.

Oh yeah. Thank you Rito

replies.body: Ouch... Can't help but will vote up, good luck man.
